# About This Guide

**Could put something in here about the cross team?**

This guide is an introduction to mapping using R in Posit Workbench. It covers basic geospatial terminology in Chapter 2, mapping examples in Chapter 3, required packages and setting up Posit in Chapter 4 areal unit mapping in Chapter 5, point mapping in chapter 6, and some useful resources in chapter 7.
